AssignmentCreate()

Assignment creation view (Create.cshtml)

Declaration
public static void AssignmentCreate()
Remarks

Features:

  • User selection with search
  • Laptop selection with availability check
  • Date range picker
  • QR code generation
  • File attachments

JavaScript Functions:

  • generateQRCode(): Creates QR code for assignment
  • validateDates(): Ensures valid date selections
  • searchUsers(): AJAX user search
  • searchLaptops(): AJAX laptop search

Validation:

  • Required fields validation
  • Date range validation
  • Business rules check

AssignmentIndex()

Assignment index view (Index.cshtml) displays list of all assignments

Declaration
public static void AssignmentIndex()
Remarks

Features:

  • Paginated list of assignments
  • Search and filter options
  • Sort by columns
  • Quick actions (Edit, Details, Delete)
  • Assignment status indicators

ViewData:

  • CurrentSort: Active sort column
  • SearchString: Current search term
  • PageSize: Items per page

Layout()

The main layout template (_Layout.cshtml) that provides the common structure for all pages.

Declaration
public static void Layout()
Remarks

Features:

  • Responsive design with Bootstrap 5
  • Navigation bar and sidebar menu
  • Footer and notification areas
  • Common CSS/JS includes
  • User session display

Sections:

  • Title: Page title override
  • Styles: Additional CSS includes
  • Scripts: Additional JavaScript includes
  • Content: Main page content

ViewData Properties:

  • Title: Page title
  • ActiveMenu: Current active menu item
  • UserName: Logged in user's name
  • Notifications: Alert messages
